topic.title: Tor error: TorManager Tor addOnion error: 510 Unrecognized command "ADD_ONION"
topic.body:
Hello
I receive the following error when I start ZeroNet with command python zeronet.py --tor always in Ubuntu 15.10:
TorManager Tor addOnion error: 510 Unrecognized command "ADD_ONION"

Looks like  Tor running correctly:
250-PROTOCOLINFO 1 
250-AUTH METHODS=COOKIE,SAFECOOKIE COOKIEFILE="/var/run/tor/control.authcookie" 
250-VERSION Tor="0.2.6.10" 
250 OK

How can I check if I use tor with ZeroNet?

1_1FbEENPR12D1yfqWWszQfNgb1Tu5TecMFV.body:
Salut
Primesc o eroare când încerc să rulez ZeroNet cu tor. Am descris-o aici: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1B2EAgvoxxBcriLxnNXXuJsboE7FbCxtmp/Tor+error+TorManager+Tor+addOnion+error+510+Unrecognized+command+ADD+ONION

Are cineva vreo idee?

> [ovidiu](#comment_1_1P46rhvckorxi9PpbN5CvJc9xWwWmzDrRw): Pare o problema similara.http://tor.stackexchange.com/questions/9352/is-add-onion-control-command-implemented-in-the-latest-stable-release
> According to the line 1405 from control-spec.txt, it's present since Tor 0.2.7.1-alpha. Current Tor Browser Bundle (version 5.0.6) use Tor 0.2.7.6, which is a stable one. ADD_ONION should be implemented.

Folosesc Tor v0.2.6.10; să văd dacă actualizez ce zice.

> [ovidiu](#comment_1_1P46rhvckorxi9PpbN5CvJc9xWwWmzDrRw): Pare o problema similara.http://tor.stackexchange.com/questions/9352/is-add-onion-control-command-implemented-in-the-latest-stable-release
> According to the line 1405 from control-spec.txt, it's present since Tor 0.2.7.1-alpha. Current Tor Browser Bundle (version 5.0.6) use Tor 0.2.7.6, which is a stable one. ADD_ONION should be implemented.

Gata, am făcut update-ul la 0.2.7.6 și totul e în regulă acum. Mersi.

1_1B2EAgvoxxBcriLxnNXXuJsboE7FbCxtmp.body:
> [nofish](#comment_414_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Tor version 2.7.5+ required. More info: http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq/#how-to-make-zeronet-work-with-tor-under-linux

Thanks. I updated TOR to 0.2.7.6 and everything is ok.
